i am a short order cook at a local diner.
i have a wife and two kids back in the states.
I'm grateful to my parents for helping me out financially.
I get to wake up early and spend time with my little brother and sister before school.

participant_2.background:
I cherish my camera because it allows me to express my creativity.
i am a classicly trained chef.
i play bass.
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.
I've been able to spend more time outdoors with my family since joining the hiking group.

content.text: Hey I'm a short order cook at a local diner and I'm grateful to my parents for helping me out financially.
Hey, that's great! I'm a classically trained chef. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I like making breakfast food the most. I love making bacon and eggs.
That sounds delicious. I make a mean omelet with cheese and ham.
Have you ever been to the Grand Canyon? I took a road trip there to see the best sunsets of my life.
No, I haven't been there yet. It's on my bucket list though. I love hiking and camping. I have a camera that I love to bring with me on my adventures.
I have a little brother and sister back in the States. I get to wake up early and spend time with them before they go to school.
That's so sweet! I have a sister who's a teacher. She's really great with kids. I play bass in a band with some friends.
That's awesome! I love music. I'm trying to learn how to play the guitar.
It's a lot of fun to learn. I've been playing for a few years now.
I'm glad to hear that! It's always nice to find someone with similar interests.
Yeah, it is. I love talking about music
